page.title: 02SHOPPING IN SOUTHPORT
page.content: Southport is a very well known shopping area in the North-West.The main shops are on Lord Street which runs right through the centre of the town. Many people come to Southport by the train.The station is on Chapel Street,and the trains run to it from many places including Bootle,Liverpool Ormskirk and Preston.For the driver, there is ample parking space and Southport also has its free park and ride shoppers bus service on Saturdays which eases the parking problem. Lord Street is one of the most famous shopping streets in the country One side is arcaded and is primarily victorian,where as the other side is made up of dignified buildings and gardens.This makes a lovely contrast and so shopping in Southport is very enjoyable.
